title: BPSO: Plain Dealing teen accidentally shot by friend
content:
PLAIN DEALING, LA (KSLA) -
A Bossier Parish teen is recovering after police say he was accidentally shot in Plain Dealing Sunday night.
Bossier deputes say the 16-year-old was at a friend's house when a single barrel shotgun was accidentally discharged.
Deputies have identified the 14-year-old friend as the shooter.
The 16-year-old boy was shot in the stomach and was taken to University Health in Shreveport.
He is expected to survive.
